customer_reviews.title: Beats Any Other Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but ran out of patience finding a solution! It takes a few shampoos but am seeing a definite improvement with less flaking and ITCHING! My hairdresser noticed the improvement on my scalp. I will repurchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

Have very fine hair that has been thinning due to a very itchy scalp that has been hard to get under control. Have definitely experienced much less scalp irritation with this shampoo. It is extremely pricey, but so far have been impressed with how it's working.

customer_reviews.title: Very good

customer_reviews.title: Worked on first try!
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different kinds of scalp shampoos that never worked I gave in and spent the extra money to try this one. I could feel a slight tingle on the first application and had a noticeable difference right away! I used it again the next day and my scalp had less flakes. For my itchy, flaky scalp I was very impressed with the immediate results. After using this for a while, I am not sure if my scalp built up a tolerance, but it doesn't seem to be still working.
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic itchy scalp, and tried lots of different brands - this is the first one that actually works. It's clear (not chalky like Selsun), smells nice (like freshly sliced apples), and doesn't sting. Since it is pricey, I alternate with my regular shampoo, and use more frequently in the winter when my scalp is really dry. Active ingredient is Piroctone Olamine (anti-fungal).

product_meta.title: Philip Kingsley Flaky Scalp Cleansing Shampoo, 8.45 fl oz
feature_bullets: CLEARS SCALPS: A highly effective, gentle shampoo that helps clear scalps of stubborn flakes and skin-cell build-up.

SOOTHES DRYNESS AND IRRITATION: Extremely soothing, with a fresh apple fragrance, it moisturizes and relieves scalp irritation while clearing flakiness and oil build-up. Won’t dry out your hair or strip it of color.
MILD ENOUGH FOR DAILY USE: Apply to wet hair and lather, gently kneading the scalp for 60 seconds. Rinse well, repeat if necessary. Follow with the appropriate Conditioner and Scalp Toner.

KEY RESULTS: 100% agreed it SOOTHED, 100% agreed their scalp felt more COMFORTABLE after use, 99% agreed it CLEARED their flaky scalp, 90% agreed they found this shampoo MORE EFFECTIVE than other similar products on the market – Independent User Trials
VEGAN FRIENDLY, PARABEN FREE & SLS/SLES FREE: Packed with calming ingredients including anti-fungal Piroctone Olamine and Lauryl Betaine which cleanses without redness or irritation.
